definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: Gossip girl: I bet you’re wondering what gossip girl is doing up so early.
sentences.chinese: 我敢肯定你們都在疑惑緋聞少女大清早的在幹嗎。

sentences.english: Very early next morning Jaimie heard the noise again.
sentences.chinese: 接下來的早上，一大清早，傑米又聽到了那個聲音。

sentences.english: Fans began lining up early in the morning to buy their cup - tie tickets.
sentences.chinese: 球迷大清早就開始排隊，等着買優勝杯決賽的入場券。

sentences.english: He is eternally telephoning me early in the morning .
sentences.chinese: 他總是大清早給我打電話。

sentences.english: Pull out the plug and wet him all over, early in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 在一大清早，把消防栓拔掉讓他全身溼答答。

sentences.english: A group of people swim in the sea in the early morning at Athens' Paleo Faliro suburb July 24, 2007 .
sentences.chinese: 大清早，一羣人在希臘雅典郊區的海上游泳。

sentences.english: Early one morning the queen went into the bath-room;
sentences.chinese: 一天大清早，王后走到浴室裏去。

sentences.english: Farmers say they have to line up at the pumps early in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 農民表示，他們大清早就必須到水泵那裏排隊。

sentences.english: But the horses woke them very early in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 但馬兒們大清早就把孩子們叫醒了。

sentences.english: Put him in the scuppers with a hosepipe on him, early in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 在一大清早，把他丟進水溝，身上再放根水管。

sentences.english: Gossip girl: I bet you're wondering what gossip girl is doing up so early.
sentences.chinese: 我敢必定你們都在疑惑緋聞奼女大清早的在幹嘛。

sentences.english: Even early in the day, the sun was burning hot.
sentences.chinese: 即便是大清早，太陽也火辣辣地燃燒着。

sentences.english: Early in the morning, shopkeepers laid out their merchandises.
sentences.chinese: 大清早店主們擺出了他們的貨品。

definition: first thing in the morning/at daybreak
at dawn/at first light/first thing in the morning
in the depth of night/late at night
erhua variant of 一大早[yi1 da4 zao3]
midnight/in the middle of the night
